timeline.message:
Revert " minor description change"

This reverts commit 0b318707dcef42294bb9250558b3bd7bd772a61b.

Revert " order by most recent"

This reverts commit 880e7f3ce593e9b8181492d670a52989187e3cc9.

Revert " added test, added ORDER BY"

This reverts commit d9ff8948123b209c57bdf1b09240a4d87432a551.

timeline.bodyText: We can reuse the TEAM_ID_ICON constant: TEAM_ID_ICON_PREVIEW  = TEAM_ID_ICON  + "/preview";
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We can extract a method to get the file handle id of a team since the same logic is used in more than one place.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Let us add some input validation, e.g. using the ValidateArgument.required... methods.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This might throw a NotFoundException for both a non existing file handle id, or for a missing preview. We can catch it here and rethrow a more useful message targeted to this request.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Please let us add // Call under test
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: the eq(urlRequest) is not needed, should be enough to use the urlRequest directly.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Let us add the tests for the various cases (e.g. if the id of the icon is not set assert that an exception is thrown, input validation etc).
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We can use any() instead of eq(urlRequest) as we are verifying below that the argument is correct.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.message: added more tests, pull request changes

timeline.bodyText: If this is public for testing purposes, we can simply use the default visibility (e.g. without modifier).
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We can set this to null?
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We can simplify this message to be such as "No preview was found for the icon of the team with id: 123"
timeline.author: marcomarasca
marcomarasca
marcomarasca
marcomarasca
marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: You can use the variable above :)
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.message: added notFoundException test, changed exception message

timeline.bodyText: Note that this is not necessary as the previous assertEquals will implicitly perform this check.
timeline.author: marcomarasca
